name: General Consultation
shortDescription: Comprehensive health checkups and routine examinations for your pets.
description: Our general consultation services provide thorough health assessments for your pets. Our experienced veterinarians conduct detailed physical examinations, discuss your pet's behavior and diet, and address any health concerns you may have. Whether it's a routine checkup or you've noticed something unusual about your pet, we're here to help.

name: Vaccination & Preventive Care
shortDescription: Protect your pets with essential vaccinations and preventive healthcare.
description: Prevention is the best medicine. Our vaccination program protects your pets from serious diseases including rabies, distemper, parvovirus, and more. We follow internationally recognized vaccination schedules tailored to your pet's age, lifestyle, and risk factors.

name: Surgery & Critical Care
shortDescription: Advanced surgical procedures with state-of-the-art equipment and expert care.
description: Our surgical suite is equipped with modern technology to perform a wide range of procedures from routine spay/neuter operations to complex surgeries. All surgeries are performed under anesthesia with continuous monitoring to ensure your pet's safety.

name: Diagnostics Laboratory
shortDescription: Comprehensive diagnostic services including X-ray, ultrasound, and lab tests.
description: Our in-house diagnostic laboratory allows us to quickly and accurately diagnose your pet's condition. From blood work to imaging, we have the tools to provide answers when your pet needs them most.

name: Cardiology
shortDescription: Expert cardiac care for pets with heart conditions.
description: Our cardiology services focus on the diagnosis and treatment of heart diseases in pets. Using advanced diagnostic tools including ECG and echocardiography, we can detect and manage various cardiac conditions.

name: Orthopedics
shortDescription: Treatment for bone, joint, and ligament injuries and conditions.
description: Our orthopedic services address musculoskeletal problems including fractures, arthritis, hip dysplasia, and ligament injuries. We offer both surgical and non-surgical treatment options.

name: Dentistry
shortDescription: Complete dental care for healthy teeth and gums.
description: Dental health is crucial for your pet's overall wellbeing. We provide comprehensive dental services including cleanings, extractions, and treatment of oral diseases.

name: Dermatology
shortDescription: Treatment for skin, coat, and ear conditions.
description: Skin problems can make your pet miserable. Our dermatology services diagnose and treat allergies, infections, parasites, and other skin conditions that affect your pet's comfort and quality of life.

name: Ophthalmology
shortDescription: Comprehensive eye care and treatment for vision problems.
description: Eye problems require specialized care. Our ophthalmology services include diagnosis and treatment of cataracts, glaucoma, corneal ulcers, and other eye conditions.

name: Neurology
shortDescription: Diagnosis and treatment of neurological disorders.
description: Neurological problems can be frightening for both pets and owners. We diagnose and treat conditions affecting the brain, spinal cord, and nervous system.

name: Oncology
shortDescription: Compassionate cancer care and treatment options.
description: A cancer diagnosis is difficult, but we're here to help. Our oncology services include diagnosis, staging, and treatment planning for pets with cancer.

name: Avian & Exotic Care
shortDescription: Specialized care for birds, rabbits, reptiles, and exotic pets.
description: Exotic pets have unique healthcare needs. Our veterinarians have experience treating birds, rabbits, guinea pigs, reptiles, and other exotic animals.

name: Grooming & Wellness
shortDescription: Professional grooming services to keep your pet looking and feeling great.
description: Regular grooming is essential for your pet's health and comfort. Our professional groomers provide gentle, stress-free grooming services.

name: Boarding Services
shortDescription: Safe and comfortable boarding with 24/7 supervision.
description: When you can't be with your pet, trust us to provide a safe, comfortable, and fun environment. Our boarding facility offers climate-controlled kennels and individual attention.

name: Nutrition Counseling
shortDescription: Expert guidance on proper nutrition for optimal health.
description: Proper nutrition is fundamental to your pet's health. Our veterinarians provide personalized dietary recommendations based on your pet's age, breed, health status, and lifestyle.

name: Rehabilitation & Physiotherapy
shortDescription: Physical therapy to aid recovery and improve mobility.
description: Physical rehabilitation helps pets recover from surgery, injury, or illness. Our therapy programs are designed to reduce pain, improve mobility, and enhance quality of life.
